summary:
Sport is a fun way to stay active and learn new skills. It can be played alone or in teams and is often competitive. From running to association football (soccer), there are many types of sports. Some are physical, while others, like chess, focus on the mind.

Sports have rules to ensure fairness. Winning might mean scoring the most points or being the fastest. Records are kept, and sports are a big source of entertainment for spectators too. People can even bet on sports, but the rules vary by country. Globally, the sports industry is worth billions.
title: Sport
